Local business leaders, political cadres, and banking executives rallied Thursday at the main branch of Hinnan Hushan Rural Commercial Bank just outside the central city of Luoyang, where they stood one by one before a microphone to pledge their backing for the bank as smiling employees brandish wads of cash before television cameras to demonstrate just how much cash, literally, the bank had.  This is insane.
